lac.algorithms.acn

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • lac.algorithms.Rule
      • lac.algorithms.acn.Rule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Rule
extends Rule
    Base class for a rule of ACN. It extends base Rule, but add functionalities to negate items
